1:30pm - 6:00pm (We start earlier than usual to set up! >> your exhibition preparations must be completed by 2:00pm!)

This is our final workshop, the focus is on the joint exhibition. You will receive a presentation area in our exhibition space that you can use according to your needs/contribution. You also have a small presentation period. More information about this event will follow in an announcement closer to the date.
>> Prepare your exhibition space and your presentation. Be ready on time to arrive before the start of the start of the seminar to set up!
